intro: Aspidistra neglecta, commonly known as the Chinese evergreen, is a shade-tolerant perennial plant native to eastern Asia. It features dark green, leathery leaves that are elliptical in shape and arranged in a rosette pattern. The plant produces small, inconspicuous white flowers that emerge from the base of the leaves. It is well adapted to low-light conditions and requires moderate humidity and well-draining soil. Aspidistra neglecta is popular as a houseplant due to its hardiness and aesthetic appeal.
